name: wired
synopsis:
Over four plus years of hard work at [*WIRED*](https://www.wired.com) magazine I helped migrate the venerable magazine from a messy array of Wordpress blogs to a unified in-house React application, all while maintaining over 25 years worth of priceless online content. This journey included everything from simple article features to massaging our caching layer.

My major projects included a massive redesign, two site replatforms, and the site's first paywall. See my project details below for more!
title: WIRED
subtitle: Where tomorrow is coded
